item.title: Do You Know The Muffin Man?
item.description:
“I like to bake and make desserts in my spare time. This is a journal of my experiments.”
By Eric Fung.
🇨🇦 Started in 2005.
Average 239 words.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Grubbits
item.description:
“A story of a father who loves food and tries to motivate his picky-eating daughter to try new things.”
By Phil Rosenthal, Lily Rosenthal.
🇺🇸 Started in 2018.
Average 493 words.

item.title: The Woks of Life
item.description:
“We're a family of 4 living between the US & China. When we're not packing or unpacking suitcases, we're sharing our culinary exploits and travels w/ each other here!”
By Judy, Bill, Sarah, Kaitlin Leung.
🇨🇳
🇺🇸 Started in 2013.
Average 62 words.
